resources.name: PayloadApi
resources.description: PayloadApi - Versioned REST API for payload management

resources.name: API V1 - Legacy
resources.description: Original API endpoints - maintained for backward compatibility

resources.name: POST Payload - Success
resources.description: Successfully save a payload using V1 API

resources.name: POST Payload - Long Content
resources.description: Test V1 API with longer content

resources.name: POST Payload - Empty Content (Error)
resources.description: Test V1 API validation - should return 400 Bad Request

resources.name: POST Payload - Null Content (Error)
resources.description: Test V1 API validation - should return 400 Bad Request

resources.name: API V2 - Enhanced
resources.description: Enhanced API with metadata support and structured responses

resources.name: POST Payload - Success with Metadata
resources.description: Successfully save a payload with full metadata using V2 API

resources.name: POST Payload - Minimal (Content Only)
resources.description: Test V2 API with only required fields (source=null, priority=normal)

resources.name: POST Payload - Mobile App (High Priority)
resources.description: Simulate high-priority payload from mobile app

resources.name: POST Payload - Web App (Normal Priority)
resources.description: Simulate normal-priority payload from web app

resources.name: POST Payload - Batch Job (Low Priority)
resources.description: Simulate low-priority payload from batch job

resources.name: POST Payload - Empty Content (Error)
resources.description: Test V2 API validation - should return 400 with structured error response

resources.name: POST Payload - Large Content
resources.description: Test V2 API with larger content payload

resources.name: GET OpenAPI V1 Schema
resources.description: Download OpenAPI 3.1 schema for V1 API (Development only)

resources.name: GET OpenAPI V2 Schema
resources.description: Download OpenAPI 3.1 schema for V2 API (Development only)
